title: Instant Funding Check website
description: Instant Funding is a proprietary CFD trading firm based in the United Kingdom, established in June 2022. The firm offers Instant, 1 Step and 2 Steps evaluation programs. Account sizes range from $1,250 to $200,000. Platforms supported include MT4, MT5, cTrader and Match Trader. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Minimum hold time: Trades held <= 60 seconds prohibited (HFT).
Martingale: Allowed for challenges/IF Micro. Instant: can add to losing positions but must avoid continuously doubling lot sizes.

payout_policy.minimum_payout: Ranges from 1.5% to 5% of starting balance or $25 (depending on program).
payout_policy.processing_time: Instant: First 14 days, then every 7 days. IF1: One payout after 24 hrs. IF Micro Pro: Every 14 days. Others: On-Demand.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Implied allowed/prohibited depending on account (see website for full details). Prohibited Practice: Account Churning (Rolling) prohibited.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Allowed (Martingale allowed for challenges/IF Micro, restricted for Instant).
firm_rules.news_trading: Allowed for Challenge phase (except Two-Phase Max 5 mins restriction). Funded: Restricted 4-5 mins before/after high impact news (depending on account type).
forbidden_strategies: Minimum hold time: Trades held <= 60 seconds prohibited (HFT).
Martingale: Allowed for challenges/IF Micro. Instant: can add to losing positions but must avoid continuously doubling lot sizes.

timeline.event: Tournament, upgrades, and the leap ahead ðŸ’¥

seo_content:
Instant Funding Technical Infrastructure

Instant Funding is a proprietary CFD trading firm based in the United Kingdom, established in June 2022. The firm offers Instant, 1 Step and 2 Steps evaluation programs. Account sizes range from $1,250 to $200,000. Platforms supported include MT4, MT5, cTrader and Match Trader. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
